headline: Constellation Energy (CEG) Price Target Raised to $420
summary: Constellation Energy Corporation (NASDAQ:CEG) is included among the 11 Best Utility Stocks to Invest in According to Hedge Funds. headline: Is Constellation Energy’s Huge Multi Year Rally Still Supported by Its Fundamentals in 2025
summary: Wondering if Constellation Energy is still worth buying after its huge run, or if most of the upside is already priced in? This article is going to unpack exactly that. The stock has cooled slightly in the last month, down 0.6%, but it is still up 1.0% over the past week, 46.5% year to date, and 57.4% over the last year, with roughly 313.7% gains over three years signaling a powerful long term trend. Those moves have come as investors refocus on nuclear and low carbon power as critical to...
